abstract: The Basel committee has made public its priorities for the coming year, and one is restricting banks’ use of internal models for measuring their assets’ risks, Mayra Rodríguez Valladares writes in the Another View column.
snippet: The Basel committee has made public its priorities for the coming year, and one is restricting banks’ use of internal models for measuring their assets’ risks, Mayra Rodríguez Valladares writes in the Another View column.

headline.main: Signs for Hope in Basel's Bank Regulation Agenda
